text: I can't take this pressure anymore. The exams are killing me and I feel like giving up on everything.
Aku udah mikirin buat nyakitin diri sendiri. Rasa sakitnya udah nggak tertahankan lagi.
Everything feels hopeless. Apa gunanya aku berusaha lagi?
I feel so alone and I don't know who to turn to. It feels like no one would even notice if I was gone.
Aku lagi panik, gabisa napas, jantungku berdebar kencang. Tolongin aku.
I'm feeling a bit stressed about my upcoming presentation. Ada tips buat ngatasin grogi pas public speaking?
Gimana caranya buat jadwal sama konselor?
I've been feeling down lately, just not myself. Can we talk?
What kind of mental health workshops are available bulan ini?
Aku habis berantem sama temenku dan sekarang aku jadi sedih banget.
